testing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a testing situation, experience etc is difficult to deal with
testing.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the process of checking something to see if it works, if it is suitable etc
testing.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The company specializes in software testing and software inspection.
All our desktop computers undergo rigorous testing.
Many people are against testing on animals.
Phase one of the testing, which involves human testing of the drug, will be underway by the end of next year.
testing.translation[1].definitions[1].de: the process of asking someone questions, usually in written form, in order to find out their level of ability, if they are suitable for a job etc
testing.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Some companies carry out on-line testing of candidates before they come in for interview.
